client.controllers

Class CreateOrderController

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.controllers.CreateOrderController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class CreateOrderController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This Class is for CreateOrderController, the class contains methods for: switching scenes, making order, entering waitinglist, showing other dates and time in case the order time is not available
    Author:
    Omer Matan
